homeHeroDes: Our recipe for success: a bunch of exceptional individuals, add a pinch of international spice, a heaping spoonful of resourcefulness ‚Ä¶ and you get the team ready to move mountains! Welcome to Pictarine!
homeTitle2: A glimpse into the Pictarine vision ‚Ä¶
homeDes2: ‚Ä¶a team overflowing with talent that is ready to take on any challenge thrown at us! Look up the definition of ‚Äúteam work‚Äù in the dictionary and you'll find our picture. Take the initiative, test, fall down, (get back up!), adjust, and repeat as necessary! At Pictarine, resilience is key. You're not expected to get it right the first time, and there's always someone there to have your back!
homeDes3: The Pictarine touch: creating the simplest photo printing experience possible on our web and mobile apps! Our apps are fast, convenient, and easy but far from boring. Innovators who are passionate about testing new technologies, adventuring into the unknown while coding new products ... that's our m.o.!
checkOut: Check out our apps and innovations
meetUpPictaDes: Whether we‚Äôre hosting or presenting ourselves, we love sharing and learning in our dedicated space with stadium seating and a big screen for big ideas!
meetUpPictaDes2: After two years of absence, we‚Äôre excited to host the Swift Meetup Toulouse. Check back soon to see speakers and topics. And we‚Äôll get into the nitty gritty of the WWDC week!
meetUpPictaDes3: Almost better than a fairytale, this meetup is all about design systems! On the one hand, Talan with their expertise in creating and governing of Omnium Finance‚Äôs design system. And on the other hand, Pictarine who redeveloped from scratch their design system for the overhaul of the tech and design of their major apps!
meetUpPictaDes4: Almost better than a fairytale, this meetup is all about design systems! On the one hand, Talan with their expertise in creating and governing of Omnium Finance‚Äôs design system. And on the other hand, Pictarine who redeveloped from scratch their design system for the overhaul of the tech and design of their major apps!
mail: Sign up to be the first to know about upcoming events!
stepping: Stepping up for causes that matter
setpingDes: A run is being organized for cancer research? Let's get our sneakers on! We think it's important to raise awareness of breast cancer detection? Everyone's getting involved, and for every pink suit worn, we donate 5 euros to the Ligue contre le Cancer du Sein. Need sponsors for the French Tech Tremplin program? We‚Äôre pumped to help underprivileged young adults from low-income neighborhoods, on scholarship, or with a handicap to launch their own businesses!
ourProductDes: An application allowing customers to easily print their photos in three clicks, anywhere in the United States. All that‚Äôs left is to pick up your order in store in less than an hour. It‚Äôs that easy!
whatWeDo: But what do we actually do at Pictarine?
whatWeDoDes: It‚Äôs simple: we develop iOS, Android and Web applications in the photo printing universe. But wait, there‚Äôs more ‚Ä¶

productCards.title: We are born in the USA!
productCards.text: Our app is currently only available in the States, the team however, can be found with croissants in Toulouse, France.

productCards.title: Providing dedicated experiences
productCards.text: We partner with big names like CVS, Walgreens, and Walmart to provide the best experience to customers shopping at each company.

productCards.title: Click & Collect
productCards.text: Your photos are printed in less than hour and ready to be picked up at the store closest to you.

description.title: Snack Puzzle
description.text: A bag of chips? A packet of tea? Dishwasher tablets? No ... a puzzle! This is not a Snack. A simple puzzle in a colored bag with quirky and unique designs and text.

description.title: Poster Collective
description.text: On the lookout for untapped market potential? Say no more. We went ahead and created Poster Collective in just three days!

descriptionTwo.title: Warner Bros.‚Ñ¢
descriptionTwo.text: In collaboration with our partner, your favorite characters, tv shows, and movies are available on our wide-variety of photo products. Catchy designs for all fans make for the perfect gift to offer ‚Ä¶ or keep!

descriptionThree.title: Team buildings
descriptionThree.text: Afterworks, Quiz Room, Go-Karting, LAN, Escape Games ‚Ä¶ when it comes to having fun, this team has no limits!

descriptionThree.title: Home grown Meetups
descriptionThree.text: Whether its to talk data, user research or even host a Swift Toulouse Meetup, the doors to our new amphitheater are always open! Don‚Äôt miss the next event!

descriptionFour.title: The iOS Team takes on the WWDC
descriptionFour.text: Toulouse-Paris-San Francisco, 12 hours on a plane, 9 hours of jet lag ‚Ä¶ but definitely worth it! Whether it‚Äôs at the WWDC, DroidCon, or Devoxx, we love learning and sharing with our peers worldwide!

problemSolvers.title: Admin
problemSolvers.text: It all starts here. From marketing to customer support and even coding aid... each tool is a piece of the puzzle in our marketing strategy allowing us to accurately target the best users possible and become marketing hackers!

problemSolvers.title: App Ninja
problemSolvers.text: With the help of this ninja, the Pictarine team can read and respond to each review for our Android and iOS apps faster than a throwing star. No need to connect to a third-party application... just Slack!

problemSolvers.title: Snip
problemSolvers.text: Snip lets us efficiently and quickly handle code extracts for macOS. Entirely written in SwitUI, Snip can handle over 100 programming languages, GitHub synchronization, and even HTML/Markdown previews.

problemSolvers.title: Trognon
problemSolvers.text: This Slack app gives us real-time app status updates with a Slack notification. It uses the App Store Connect API.

problemSolvers.title: BigQuery
problemSolvers.text: Ever accidentally spend over $200 on a query? Then our public, open-source BigQuery extension is for you! It lets you know exactly how much your query will cost before you hit 'Run'.

problemSolvers.title: Release Note Now
problemSolvers.text: This automatic release-note generator for GitHub is the tool for publishing open-source projects! The first-ever library on NPM, made available to the public by Pictarine.

problemSolvers.title: Today‚Äôs Widget
problemSolvers.text: Today's Widget is a quick and easy weather widget for the iPhone home screen. It works on all iOS/iPadOS devices currently running iOS 14+.

multiSliderDes: From cooking classes and karaoke nights, to
multiSliderDesTwo: kayaking adventures and axe throwing, we‚Äôre
multiSliderDesThree: never bored at Pictarine! There‚Äôs something for
lifeSliderOneDes: Guillaume and Max join TechStars, the largest network of entrepreneurs in the world and pack their bags for Chicago.
lifeSliderTwoDes: The first partnership with Walgreens, the second largest pharmacy chain in the US, is signed! Thanks to our 1-hour, pick up in-store photo offer we drive millions of customers into the 9,021 partner stores nationwide. Making life easier, removing the need for kiosks ‚Ä¶ that‚Äôs the Pictarine way!
lifeSliderThreeDes: We add a home delivery option in our apps with our newest partner District Photo, passing the 2 million customers mark.
lifeSliderFourTitle: Taking it to the next level
lifeSliderFourDes: CVS and their network of 9,751 stores join our list of partners. We now have 3 delivery options: in-store with Walgreens and CVS or home delivery.
lifeSliderFiveDes: Why stop there? 2020 marks the signing of our third partner: Walmart, the number one retailer in the US.
lifeSliderSixDes: A daring new challenge: rewriting and redesigning our applications 100% from scratch. Never resting on our laurels, that‚Äôs our motto.
lifeSliderSevenDes: A shiny new, 1,600 m2 office space for our rapidly growing team! And what an office it is ‚Ä¶ gym, stadium-seating amphitheater, nap rooms, and more for the best working environment possible!
comeAndSee: Come and see how it looks!
parce: Because innovation is in our DNA!
pictaLifeQue: Que Calor! We packed our sunglasses and swim trunks for a few unforgettable days under the Spanish sun in Mallorca in 2022. Cue every form of transport possible: hot air balloons, catamarans, Jeep rides ‚Ä¶ but we also took a day to sit down and reflect on what values make Pictarine, Pictarine! Back to work, with smiles on our tanned faces and memories (to be printed, of course)!
pictaLifeDes: Defining who we are: we put words to the values that unite us during our 2022 work trip to Mallorca. And then we took it to the next level, as we do, to share what that really means ‚Ä¶
pictaLifeDes3: Everyone has an inner spark. Here at Pictarine, we not only recognize each individual‚Äôs unique talents, but we‚Äôre also here to fan the flames to help you burn bright in your work, career path, and beyond! The record to beat ‚Ä¶ 1, 2, 3, 4 ‚Ä¶ 5 different job positions in our company.
pictaLifeDes4: Team spirit is the name of the game, with an emphasis on sharing knowledge and skills! And what better way to put this into practice than pushing yourself beyond your comfort zone. Solo we might go faster, but all together we are sure to go further!
pictaLifeDes5: Because it took a heck of a lot of audacity, resourcefulness, and resilience to get where we are today! And who better to tell our story and share our ambitions than Guillaume, our CEO.
techTeamDes: At Pictarine, tech is the heart and soul behind our product. We ask just one thing of the Tech team: come ready to share your ideas! From business and product ideas, to the latest in innovation and development, nothing is off-limits!
techTeamTitle4: Staying up to date with tech advances
techTeamTitle10: Fun times this way! Discover the Picta Life
techTeamDes3: What we‚Äôre proud of: The Squid Project!
techTeamDes4: In 2022, we bid adieu to our old technologies and code dependencies and said bonjour to our 100% rewritten app code!
techTeamDes5: Chez Pictarine on adore le challenge de cr√©er nos propres outils qui r√©pondent exactement √† nos besoins. L‚Äôavantage de cr√©er plut√¥t qu‚Äôutiliser une solution existante ? Le challenge et la praticit√© ! Overview de nos outils handmade et parfaitement tailored pour nos besoins.
techTeamCard: What app are you going to concoct in the Picta Lab? üß™
checkOut2: Check out the cream of the crop of our main apps
partnershipsDes: Designing, building, and running unique apps: this is just the tip of the iceberg. Partnering with Pictarine means untapping new revenue-driving opportunities. Retailers, licensors, manufacturers, marketers..., there‚Äôs no limit to what we could do with our partners.
partnershipsDes2: Benefit from our growth marketing and tech expertise.
partnershipsDes3: Multiple top Fortune 500 companies trust us everyday with their business. How about you?
partnershipsDes4: Our teams provide the best customers experiences using the latest technologies, tailored UX and designs for our continued pursuit of perfection.
partnershipsDes6: It ain‚Äôt over till it‚Äôs over! If the door is closed, try the window, then go for the roof!
partnershipsDes7: We have years of experience bringing quick and easy photo printing to millions of customers in our partners' stores. At Pictarine we are always hungry for more ideas, challenges, and partners.

partnershipsCardTwo.title: Scale your business
partnershipsCardTwo.text: Expand your customer base, increase your CLTV, and maximize your visibility.

partnershipsCardTwo.title: Have no limits
partnershipsCardTwo.text: Convert bold ideas into profitable successes.

partnershipsCardTwo.title: Develop together
partnershipsCardTwo.text: At Pictarine we create strong relationships with our partners founded on trust and common values

multipaleRowSlider.name: Lead Legal Counsel
multipaleRowSlider.pointTwo: ‚Ä¢ Be a reference for the legal aspect
multipaleRowSlider.pointThree: ‚Ä¢ Responsible for Intellectual Property and Data

quoteTitle: A word from the partnership team
quoteDes: Everything's possible! Share your craziest partnership ideas: from short collaborations to long term projects, we are all ears. Drop us a line and let's make it happen!
joinUsDes: We‚Äôre only getting bigger! We‚Äôre constantly looking for talented, hungry, and bilingual individuals who have an appetite for foreign adventure. Creative problem solvers with team spirit who never settle ‚Ä¶ simply put, our future teammates aren‚Äôt afraid to roll up their sleeves.
joinUsDes2: Show us what you got and send over your r√©sum√©, CV, cover letter or even projects! We take the time to check out each submission.
joinusTextArea: Tell us more about you and what drives you !
joinusUpload: Upload a file, document, illustration, video ‚Ä¶
joinusDes3: Let‚Äôs get to know each other! And what better way to do so than with a thorough recrutement process. It‚Äôs the perfect occasion to learn more about Pictarine and picture what your work life will be with your future team!

sliderRecrutment.title: Phone screening
sliderRecrutment.text: A first chat with your future team manager to learn more about you ‚Ä¶ and about us!

sliderRecrutment.title: Team Interview
sliderRecrutment.text: An interview with your future manager and a teammate.

sliderRecrutment.title: Immersive Test
sliderRecrutment.text: A practice test adapted to your future role, crafted by your manager, and followed by a presentation of your work.

sliderRecrutment.title: Final Interview
sliderRecrutment.text: Meet with a member of the Management Committee and Elodie, Head of People.

sliderRecrutment.title: Welcome Aboard
sliderRecrutment.text: All that‚Äôs left is to sign your hiring papers and start getting excited for your first day!

diffPicta.title: Support & Feedback
diffPicta.sentence: We encourage feedback above all else! You can count on personal and professional support from your manager, thanks to your weekly 1-1s.

diffPicta.title: Exploration
diffPicta.sentence: We‚Äôre always on the lookout for the next big thing, big project, big technology! You‚Äôre never bored with new, fun, innovative projects to explore.

diffPicta.title: Sharing & Learning
diffPicta.sentence: Internal talks, Meetups, etc ‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre always ready to learn from each other and share our know-how!

diffPicta.title: There‚Äôs no place like ‚Ä¶ work!
diffPicta.sentence: Snacks, fresh fruits, and drinks ‚Ä¶ oh my! Whether you are looking for a healthy option or a sugar rush, we‚Äôre fully stocked.

diffPicta.title: Flexibility
diffPicta.sentence: Remote, In-office, Hybrid? At Pictarine, you have the option of working remotely a few times a week, based on your meetings and schedule. We also offer flexible working hours to promote a healthy work-life balance!

diffPicta.title: Compensation & Benefits
diffPicta.sentence: Your health premium, additional paid leave, profit-sharing, stock options, vacation bonus, holiday gift cards ‚Ä¶ and much more!

diffPicta.title: Activities
diffPicta.sentence: Meetups, yearly work trips, Mario Kart tournaments, bake-offs, gym classes, massages, gnocchi workshops, and even Poker nights ‚Ä¶

joinusTitle4: In the meantime, meet your future teammates!

businessInfo.title: million downloads
businessInfo.text: Since 2016, our apps have been downloaded 16M times ‚Ä¶ and counting!

businessInfo.title: partner stores
businessInfo.text: Working with some of the biggest names in the business, our partners include Walgreens, CVS & Walmart

businessInfo.title: million photos printed
businessInfo.text: That‚Äôs 11 photos per second per year!

businessInfoTwo.title: developers
businessInfoTwo.text: A team of motivated all-stars, creating products that rock. Challenging each other daily, with code reviews and programming to take us to the next level!

businessInfoTwo.title: crash free
businessInfoTwo.text: That‚Äôs what our 2M of our yearly app users love about us!

businessInfoTwo.title: applications
businessInfoTwo.text: From Walgreens, CVS, and Walmart to iOS, Android and Web ‚Ä¶ plus we can‚Äôt forget about our internal apps and our innovation projects!
